blocks.text: Everything you need to know to get started

The navigation bar on the left side of the Page offers a variety of Articles. Additionally, the articles are also grouped by their general topic. For example: an article about Event Actions would be grouped in Systems.

Optionally you can type out the exact address of an article, which is neither time-efficient nor actually beneficial. Example: Visiting [https://cookiecrood.github.io/html/home/Introduction.html](/html/home/Introduction.html) directly.

It is planned for the Documentation to have all of the general information regarding Housing.

Such as:

items: How Systems/Other coding related stuff works

blocks.text: The following HTSL related content is also planned for the Documentation:

items: Custom HTSL code snippets for public use

blocks.text: The Documentation does not contain a lot of content as of now, help out by contributing to it in the [Discord](https://discord.gg/qRvcDc3vz5).
